PART I : S EC. (I) - GAZETTE EXTRAORDINARY OF THE DEMOCRATIC SOCIALIST REPUBLIC OF SRI LANKA - 17.02.2017
This Gazette Extraordinary  can be downloaded from  www.documents.gov.lk
Local Authorities Elections Ordinance (Chapter 262)
Order under section 3D
BY virtue of powers vested in me, by section 3D of the Local Authorities Elections Ordinance (Chapter 262), I, Faiszer
Musthapha, Minister of Provincial Councils and Local Government, do by this Order amend the orders published in
the gazette Extraordinary No. 1928/26 of 21st August 2015 by amending boundaries, number of members and the
constituent parts of wards set out in second column in respect of Local Authorities set out in first column of first
schedule here to, as indicated in italics in second schedule of this order.
F
AISZER MUSTHAPHA
Minister of Provincial Councils
and Local Government.
17th February, 2017
Colombo.
PG 3397 – 1,115  (2017/02)
 N.B. – Sinhala and Tamil versions are printed separately.
